verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H1665>Gittith<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H113>Lord<s%>, how <S%H117>excellent<s%> is thy <S%H8034>name<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>! who hast <S%H5414>set<s%> thy <S%H1935>glory<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.

Out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H5768>babes<s%> and <S%H3243>sucklings<s%> hast thou <S%H3245>ordained<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> because of thine <S%H6887>enemies<s%>, that thou mightest <S%H7673>still<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and the <S%H5358>avenger<s%>.
When I <S%H7200>consider<s%> thy <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H676>fingers<s%>, the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, which thou hast <S%H3559>ordained<s%>;
What is <S%H582>man<s%>, that thou art <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of him? and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, that thou <S%H6485>visitest<s%> him?
For thou hast made him a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2637>lower<s%> than the <S%H430>angels<s%>, and hast <S%H5849>crowned<s%> him with <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H1926>honour<s%>.
Thou madest him to have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>; thou hast <S%H7896>put<s%> all things under his <S%H7272>feet<s%>:
All <S%H6792>sheep<s%> and <S%H504>oxen<s%>, yea, and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>;
The <S%H6833>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and whatsoever passeth <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>.
O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H113>Lord<s%>, how <S%H117>excellent<s%> is thy <S%H8034>name<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>!
